Name: Pixxxel
About the game: Pixxxel is a game where you can immerse yourself in the colorful world of platform games, but far from simple ones. You have a huge number of obstacles that will not leave you alone. Unique levels and traps, time dilation mechanics - what else do you need to enjoy the game? You will start the level again over and over again, but doesn't the difficulty make it more fun to complete the level? Of course it is! Four types of locations and constantly emerging new traps will never let you get bored. Start your passage and try to keep within the shortest period of time, will you succeed? As the saying goes, you never know until you try. good luck with your passage!
